I AM A FIRST GENERATION

AVAILABLE FOR DAVE AT 12:30.

I JUST WANT TO SAY IT IS
POSSIBLE TO LOSE SIGHT OF HOW

MUCH DAVE CHANGED COMEDY.
THE COMEDY LANDSCAPE IS SO

THICKLY PLANTED WITH THE FOREST
OF DAVE'S IDEAS THAT WE

SOMETIMES NEED TO REMIND
OURSELVES JUST HOW TALL HE

STANDS.
SO JUST FOR THE RECORD, I'M NOT

REPLACING DAVID LETTERMAN.
HIS CREATIVE LEGACY IS A HIGH

PENCIL MARK ON A DOOR FRAME THAT
WE ALL HAVE TO MEASURE OURSELVES

AGAINST.
BUT WE WILL TRY TO HONOR HIS

ACHIEVEMENT BY DOING THE BEST
SHOW WE CAN AND OCCASIONALLY,

MAKING THE NETWORK VERY MAD AT
US.

OTHER.

>> ALL RIGHT OKAY, THE WHOLE
